meanings.definition: A mass of bacteria embedded in a gelatinous substance
meanings.sent1: The zoogloea was a clump of tiny organisms stuck together in a gooey material.
meanings.sent2: Under the microscope, the zoogloea looked like a blob of bacteria surrounded by jelly.
meanings.sent3: The zoogloea decided to throw a party and invited all its bacterial friends to swim in the gelatinous pool.
meanings.sent4: The zoogloea resembled a tiny city, with the bacteria acting as citizens living in the gelatinous skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: As I observed the zoogloea, the image of a bacterial metropolis in a jelly world formed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A slimy bacterial colony floating in water
meanings.sent1: The zoogloea drifted lazily in the pond, a slimy cluster of bacteria enjoying the water.
meanings.sent2: When the zoogloea was disturbed, it released a cloud of bacteria into the surrounding water.
meanings.sent3: The zoogloea threw a water party, inviting all the bacteria to swim and play in the slimy colony.
meanings.sent4: The zoogloea on the surface of the water looked like a miniature slime island inhabited by bacterial creatures.
meanings.sent5: The slimy zoogloea floated on the water, creating a bacterial paradise in the pond.
